traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The priest can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Thunderous Touch
entries: {@atk ms} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 27 (5d10 damage) thunder damage.

actions.name: Voice of the Kraken (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: A kraken speaks through Fhenimore with a thunderous voice audible within 300 feet. Creatures of Fhenimore's choice that can hear the kraken's words (which are spoken in Abyssal, Infernal, or Primordial) must succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The priest's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
